full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Solicitation Number: W0107-24-J333/E

### Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
#### For Supply of Office Chairs

**Reference Number: CB-74-39678774**

**Amended Solicitation:** Amendment #9

#### Solicitation Date: February 5, 2024

#### Closing Date: 02/19/2024, 14:00:00 hrs

### Details
#### Tender Description
The Department of Defence requests proposals for the supply of office chairs.

#### Classification
* Office Furniture (UNSPSC 56101700)

#### Procurement Category: Goods and Services
#### Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
#### Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements
The solicitation is subject to the following Canadian trade agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

#### Regions of Operation
* Ontario (excluding NCR)
#### Regions of Delivery
* Petawawa

#### Contact Information
* Contracting Entity: 4 CDSB Technical Services
* Contact: Jennifer Schryer-Godin
* Email: Jennifer.Schryer-Godin@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 687-5511

#### Tender Documents
Tender documents can be downloaded from the [Canada Buys website.](insert link)
List of attachments have been removed, if you want me to include them, just let me know. 
Tender notices can be view in both English and French.
